docs.snippet: Israeli businessman Amos Genish was vital to Vivendi SA's successful foray in Brazil a few years ago. Now the French media company has turned to him to create a single platform for digital, content and media distribution services, something its ri...
docs.lead_paragraph: Israeli businessman Amos Genish was vital to Vivendi SA's successful foray in Brazil a few years ago. Now the French media company has turned to him to create a single platform for digital, content and media distribution services, something its rivals are struggling to do.
